info.name: UI: Places:  fix selection visibility
info.description: Applies to Firefox Places/Library (aka Bookmark Manager), left-side pane, selected tree item.  Enhance visibility of <u>selected</u> but <u>unfocused</u> tree item as shown in preview.  before: almost invisible pale pink; after: pale blue.
info.additionalInfo: notes:  this is a totally amateur hack job to fix this horrible UI nuisance.
